snippet.title: Game Boy Advance Longplay [079] Need for Speed - Most Wanted
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Stenio Henrique

In this game you need to challenge the blacklist to defeat the best driver in town (Razor) and get your BMW back. This game has no police chase, only barricades that serve to stop the rider in the race. The difficulty system improved, but some elements in the game are ridiculous as well as the format of the tracks of Need For Speed Underground 2 PC (Circuits). It's just a racing game like the predecessors. There's nothing spectacular, just new cars and more racing. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
